item.title: We Lived With God
item.description: A renowned scientist testifies of our premortal life, our divine Creator, and the limitless perspective of eternal life.

item.title: Because of Him
item.description: Jesus is the Son of God and our Savior. Because of Him, death is conquered, our lives have meaning, and we can live with God again. http://www.mormon.org/becauseofhim

item.title: Our Eternal Life
item.description: We are eternal beings. We lived as spirits before we were born and we will continue to live after we die.

item.title: The Plan of Salvation
item.description: Heavenly Father's plan of salvation is compared to a three-act play, showing that knowledge of the plan helps us in our everyday lives.

item.title: The Blessings of Scripture
item.description: As part of the 400th anniversary of the King James Bible, consider our blessings and responsibilities in having God's word so readily available.

item.title: The Most Important Things to Learn
item.description: Spencer asks Elder David A. Bednar, "What is the most important thing we'll be learning about in seminary this year?"

item.title: Why Study the Doctrine and Covenants?
item.description: Rachel asks Elder David A. Bednar, "Why is it so important for us to study The Doctrine and Covenants and Church History?"

item.title: Overview of Church History
item.description: This video gives a brief introduction to the different time periods of Church history.

item.title: Foundation
item.description: Elder Jeffrey R. Holland explains the foundation of Apostles and Prophets. Ephesians 4:11-14

item.title: Foundation of Apostles and Prophets
item.description: Elder Holland tells us that Apostles and Prophets are meant to bless us all and form foundation stones of the true Church, and all of those are based upon the Redeemer.

item.title: The Great Apostasy
item.description: Wilford Woodruff's search for the true Church explains the Apostasy and need for the Restoration. It emphasizes four essential elements of the true Church that were lost because of the Great Apostasy.

item.title: The True and Living Church
item.description: (D&C 1:30) President Henry B. Eyring teaches about the True and Living Church.

item.title: Seek the Lord
item.description: (D&C 1:14-16) A video showing the challenging choices that are placed before all people.

item.title: Advice for Studying the Scriptures
item.description: Abigail asks Elder David A. Bednar, "Do you have any advice for us as we study our scriptures by ourselves and personally?"

item.title: Continuous Conversion—What Scriptures Mean to Me
item.description: A young brother discusses the role of the scriptures in his and his mother’s conversion, in his own mission experience, and in his ongoing role as a young father and Church member.

item.title: Prophets and Revelation - Hearing His Voice
item.description: A seminary class in Samoa learns that seeking revelation requires effort and action.

item.title: Joseph Smith Was a Prophet part 1
item.description: President Monson shares a story of two missionaries in Canada bearing their testimony of the Prophet Joseph Smith. Part 1

item.title: Origin
item.description: The best way to find truth is to go to the origin, our Heavenly Father, and ask for inspiration through prayer.

item.title: The Message of the Restoration
item.description: Declare to the world that the fullness of the gospel of Jesus Christ was restored to the earth.

item.title: Preparation of Joseph Smith: The First Vision
item.description: As an answer to a fervent prayer, Joseph Smith sees God the Father and Jesus Christ.

item.title: Joseph Smith Was a Prophet part 2
item.description: President Monson shares a story of two missionaries in Canada bearing their testimony of the Prophet Joseph Smith. Part 2

item.title: The Restoration
item.description: Joseph Smith's search for truth led to the First Vision and the Restoration of the gospel of Jesus Christ.

item.title: Making Seminary a Spiritual Experience
item.description: Taylor asks Elder David A. Bednar, "What could I do to make my seminary experience spiritual like yours?"

item.title: Feeling the Holy Ghost
item.description: Feelings of the Holy Spirit can be likened to hope, joy and peace in your heart and mind.

item.title: The Spirit of Revelation
item.description: Quote given by Elder David A. Bednar in the Sunday morning session of general conference on April 3, 2011.

item.title: Joseph Smith and the Minister
item.description: (JS-H 1:21-26) Joseph Smith recounts his vision to a local minister.

item.title: The First Vision
item.description: President Gordon B. Hinckley teaches about the First Vision

item.title: Deciding How to Focus Repentance
item.description: Repentance is an opportunity to receive blessings.

item.title: A Seer Will I Raise Up
item.description: (JST, Genesis 50) Joseph Smith is prepared to bring to pass the restoration of the Gospel.

item.title: Ordinances and Covenants - The Spirit of Elijah
item.description: A young woman and her family discover the unanticipated blessings of family history work.

item.title: Ministry of Joseph Smith: The Book of Mormon
item.description: Joseph Smith receives an ancient record from the angel Moroni and translates it by the power of the Holy Spirit into what is called the Book of Mormon.

item.title: A Marvelous Work and a Wonder
item.description: Isaiah prophesies of the coming forth of the Book of Mormon (JS-H 1:60-65).

item.title: The Work of God
item.description: (D&C 3,10) Martin Harris tells a young man the story of the lost manuscript, emphasizing that the works, designs and purposes of God cannot be frustrated.

item.title: Leave the Party
item.description: John's life may have been very different had he not had the courage to leave a party one evening in Japan.

item.title: Thwarting Satan's Evil Designs
item.description: (D&C 10:20-27) Elder Joseph B. Wirthlin teaches the importance of thwarting Satan's evil designs.

item.title: Unselfish Service
item.description: The Savior has taught us to follow His example and serve others.

item.title: The Vineyard
item.description: Youth in the Vineyard Ward share how Christlike love has brought many peers to a knowledge of the gospel.

item.title: Missionaries to Match Our Message
item.description: (D&C 4) Elder M. Russell Ballard explains how we need missionaries to match Our message.

item.title: Testimony of the Witnesses
item.description: (Ether 5) Elder Dallin H. Oaks shares the significance of more than one witness to the Book of Mormon.

item.title: How God Talks to Us Today
item.description: A woman describes the power of prayer in her life.

item.title: Patterns of Light: Spirit of Revelation
item.description: What is the connection between light and revelation? In part 3 of this three part series, Elder David A. Bednar explains the patterns of light by which God communicates with us and how they lead to the spirit of revelation. View Part 1, Patterns of Light: Light of Christ View Part 2, Patterns of Light: Discerning Light

item.title: Receiving Revelation
item.description: You can receive personal revelation from God by living His gospel and having the gift of the Holy Spirit.

item.title: Our Most Important Duty
item.description: (D&C 6:14-24) Elder Jeffrey R. Holland teaches about Our most important duty.

item.title: "This is the Spirit of Revelation"
item.description: (D&C 6,8-9) The early experiences of Oliver Cowdery serve as a case study to help students understand principles of personal revelation.

item.title: Being Lead by the Holy Ghost
item.description: The guidance of the Holy Ghost becomes stronger and clearer as we constantly listen and give heed.

item.title: Voice of the Spirit
item.description: In a world full of noise and many voices, President James E. Faust invites us to listen to and follow the voice of the Spirit, which is calm and quiet and leads to eternal life.

item.title: Having the Holy Ghost
item.description: You can invite the Holy Spirit into your life through prayer, scripture study and being obedient to God’s commandments.

item.title: Getting Answers to Prayers
item.description: (D&C 8-9) Elder Richard G. Scott teaches how to get answers to prayers.

item.title: Proceed with Trust
item.description: Elder Richard G. Scott teaches the importance of proceeding with trust (D&C 9:7-9).

item.title: Highlight: The Choice Generation—Randall L. Ridd
item.description: Randall L. Ridd offers four principles to help young men educate their desires and use technology wisely.

item.title: Gordon Hinckley: Lessons I Learned as a Boy
item.description: President Gordon B. Hinckley recalls a story of an older boy and his young companion as they find an old coat and a badly worn pair of shoes by the roadside.

item.title: Our Work Is to Keep the Commandments
item.description: (D&C 11: 12-14) Elder David A. Bednar teaches how our work is to keep the commandments.

item.title: Special Witness - Elder Bednar
item.description: Elder Bednar recounts the restoration of the priesthood and bears his apostolic testimony of the events.

item.title: Keys of the Aaronic Priesthood
item.description: Elder Oaks helps us understanding what it means to hold the key of the ministering of angels.

item.title: Angelic Messages
item.description: Elder Oaks teaches that an Aaronic Priesthood holder can become a ministering angel to those they serve.

item.title: Bearers of the Aaronic Priesthood
item.description: Elder Perry shares an experience about some Aaronic Priesthood holders administering the sacrament to individuals living in an assisting living facility.

item.title: Restoration of the Aaronic Priesthood
item.description: (D&C 13) Joseph Smith and Oliver Cowdery receive the Aaronic Priesthood by the hand of John the Baptist.

item.title: Good Things to Come
item.description: Elder Jeffrey R. Holland recalls his days as a poor young father with a broken-down family car and testifies that for those who embrace the gospel of Jesus Christ, there are better days and good things to come.

item.title: Endure to the End
item.description: (D&C 14:7) President Dieter F. Uchtdorf teaches how to endure to the end.

item.title: Inviting All to Come unto Christ: Sharing the Gospel
item.description: When Junior, a young man in a small Florida branch, decided he didn’t want to be alone in his belief in Christ, he invited a friend. One friend joined, then another, and another . . .

item.title: God Knows Who I Am
item.description: Elder Bednar relates a story about a Stake President who had a dream about a young man in his stake.

item.title: God Will Lift Us Up
item.description: Rather than focus on her medical condition, Brittany has found comfort in serving others and trusting in the Lord.
